input_text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to play a warlock on world of warcraft?
input_text.Response A:
Oh my gosh! Playing a warlock in World of Warcraft is so much fun! Here's how you can do it:

1. First, you need to choose the warlock class. It's like picking your favorite superhero!
2. Next, you need to pick a race. You can be a human, orc, troll, or any other cool race!
3. Now, you need to choose your starting zone. This is where you'll learn all about being a warlock!
4. As a warlock, you'll be able to cast spells and summon cool creatures to help you in battle. You'll also be able to use weapons and armor to protect yourself!
5. To get stronger, you'll need to go on quests and kill bad guys. This will give you experience points, which will help you level up and become a stronger warlock!

Remember, always be careful and have fun! And never, ever try to summon any real demons, okay? That's just not a good idea!
input_text.Response B:
Sure! A warlock is a class in World of Warcraft that uses dark magic and shadowy creatures to do their bidding. They can summon demons, cast curses, and create barriers to protect themselves. Here are some tips for playing a warlock:

1. Choose your race wisely. Warlocks have a few different race options, each with their own unique abilities and traits. For example, the Blood Elf race has a passive ability that increases the damage they deal to undead creatures, while the Orc race has a passive ability that increases the health of their pets.
2. Choose your specialization wisely. Warlocks have three different specializations: Affliction, Demonology, and Destruction. Each specialization has its own unique abilities and playstyle. For example, Affliction warlocks specialize in dealing damage over time, while Destruction warlocks specialize in dealing burst damage.
3. Use your pet wisely. Warlocks have a pet that they can summon to help them in battle. Use your pet to do damage, tank enemies, or provide crowd control.
4. Use your abilities wisely. Warlocks have a variety of abilities that they can use in battle. Use your abilities to deal damage, crowd control enemies, or protect yourself.
5. Use your curses wisely. Warlocks have a variety of curses that they can use to debuff enemies and make them more vulnerable to damage. Use your curses wisely to gain an advantage in battle.

I hope these tips help you get started with playing a warlock in World of Warcraft!

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
